list.name: Revert "Set theme jekyll-theme-cayman"
list.comment:
Revert "Set theme jekyll-theme-cayman"
This reverts commit 93bce6b

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Added function to view applied leave.
Added function to Accept/Decline leave applications.
Added the function to add children to the database.
Added the function to add view the syllabus.
Introduced OOP principles to the project.
Added the basic functions of the login system.
Merged Harith's login system and parent profile to the project.
Introduced Bootstrap 4 with Shards to the project.
Added input validations for addChild form.
Added input validations for applyLeave form.
Resolved all dependencies and cleaned the code.
Resolved database connection errors and connected isuri's pages.
